Class TimeSlicedAlgorithm

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.bham.bd.entity.ai.navigation.algorithms.TimeSlicedAlgorithm
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    TimeSlicedAStar, TimeSlicedDijkstras

    public abstract class TimeSlicedAlgorithm
extends Object
    Base class to define a common interface for graph search algorithms

    • Method Detail

      • cycleOnce

        public abstract SearchStatus cycleOnce()
        When called, this method runs the algorithm through one search cycle. The method returns an enumerated value (target_found, target_not_found, search_incomplete) indicating the status of the search
        Returns:
        SearchStatus to indicate the searching status after a run

      • getPathAsPathEdges

        public abstract List<PathEdge> getPathAsPathEdges()
        called by PathPlanner when a searching task was ended
        Returns:
        a lst of PathEdge

      • setExpandCondition

        public abstract void setExpandCondition(ExpandPolicies.ExpandCondition expandCondition)
        set expand condition for algorithm. It will also reset the one inside algorithm.
        Parameters:
        expandCondition - seeExpandPolicies

      • isTriggerActive

        public abstract boolean isTriggerActive()
